full_text:
COMMERCIAL ACTIVITIES PROHIBITED.

	No person shall solicit, sell, hawk, or peddle any goods, wares, or merchandise of any sort whatsoever within the entrance channel; nor shall any person distribute circulars, handbills or advertising matter within the entrance channel, nor erect any signs, posters, or other advertising media upon any breakwater, structure, sign, or marker within said entrance channel.

6.catch_line: Permits For Races And Special Events.

14.catch_line: Anchoring Or Mooring In Entrance Channel.

16.catch_line: Fees Incidental To Recovery, Movement And Storage.

17.catch_line: Dangerous Vessels, Sunken Vessels, Or Obstruction Of Channels.

22.catch_line: Prohibited Operation Upon Waters Of The Channel.

23.catch_line: Prohibited Activities Upon Areas Abutting The Entrance Channel.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

COMMERCIAL ACTIVITIES PROHIBITED. (§ 69.19)

  COMMERCIAL ACTIVITIES PROHIBITED.	No person shall solicit, sell, hawk, or
peddle any goods, wares, or merchandise of any sort whatsoever within the
entrance channel; nor shall any person distribute circulars, handbills or
advertising matter within the entrance channel, nor erect any signs, posters, or
other advertising media upon any breakwater, structure, sign, or marker within
said entrance channel.
